instructions: wizard needs to collect the hotel name, user's name, room number, service request and service time sequentially from the user before conducting database querying.

replies.user_hotel_service_request_ask_service: I'd like to submit a service request.
replies.hotel_ask_hotel: At what hotel are you currently staying?
replies.ask_name: Could I get your name, please?
replies.hotel_ask_room_number: Could you provide your room number, please?
replies.hotel_ask_service_request: Right, please let us know your request now.
replies.hotel_ask_time: At what time would you like us to provide the service?
replies.db_hotel_inform_service_request_successf: [RESULT] APIName = hotel_service_request ; RequestStatus = Request Confirmed ; RoomNumber = [NUMBER] ; Time = [TIME] ;
replies.hotel_inform_service_request_successful:
Your request has been submitted successfully.
A member of the service team will knock on the door of room {room_number:d} at {time:s}!
replies.db_hotel_inform_service_request_failed: [RESULT] APIName = hotel_service_request ; RequestStatus = Request Failed ; RoomNumber = [NUMBER] ; Time = [TIME] ;
replies.hotel_inform_service_request_failed: I am sorry to inform you that your request could not be processed at this time.
replies.anything_else: Is there anything else that I can do for you?
replies.hotel_inform_nothing_found: Unfortunately there are no services available that match your search. Would you like to change any of your criteria?
replies.out_of_scope: I am sorry, I don't quite understand what you mean. I am only able to help you with room service.
